## ThirdwebSDK.getProgram() method

Get an SDK interface for a deployed program

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getProgram(address: string): Promise<Program>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | Address of the program |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Program](./solana.program.md)<!-- -->&gt;

SDK interface for the program
